person.persName: Daniel Bodkin (Ballard County, Kentucky, gunsmith and farmer.)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, gunsmith and farmer. Virginia native. Son of Charles Bodkin. Married to Eliza Jane Bodkin in Shelby County, Kentucky, on October 28, 1849. Father of Byron Bodkin, Alice Bodkin, Daniel Bodkin, Jr., Mary T. Bodkin, Olive F. Bodkin, and Eliza Bodkin. Gunsmith in Ballard County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Ballard County in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860. Employed John S. Turner as a farm laborer in Ballard County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Ballard County in 1860.
